title: Authorities identify 15-year-old boy killed in Trenton
content:
TRENTON -- The Mercer County Prosecutor's Office on Sunday identified a 15-year-old boy killed in Trenton as Maurice Wimbush-Jalaah.
Maurice was shot outside a housing complex in North Trenton, Trenton Police Lt. Stephen Varn said Saturday.
He was taken to Capital Health Regional Medical Center, where he died of his wounds. He would have turned 16 on June 21.
The Mercer County Homicide Task Force is investigating the killing.
